nodes.text: Rogar Farnoster was the acclaimed author of The Slug Named Grendel and Night Mynock, the latter a HoloNet News Top 5 seller. While researching for The Slug Named Grendel, Farnoster accompanied Professor Sedan Anang and other University of Sanbra scientists when they investigated a record-breaking 80-meter space slug found in the Borkeen Belt.
